caption.p: Detailed structure of Zika virus (ZIKV) genome. ZIKV genomic RNA is capped but lacks poly A tail. The viral RNA codes for a polyprotein that is co-translationally cleaved to yield 11 proteins: three structural proteins (C prM/M and E) and eight non-structural proteins (NS1, NS2A, NS2B, NS3, NS4A, 2K, NS4B, and NS5).
